name: 666 Coins
description:
You are a thief. Satan Himself appeared before you and gave you the most dangerous job: Walk The Nether and steal 666 coins. Use your wits to gain the loot and get back to the entrance - or your soul will be lost forever!

  • F (hold) - Interact with object in world
  • LMB (hold) - Use item in inventor
  • Space - Jump / climb ledges (also needed to leave ladders)
  • RMB - Drop or throw (hold) item in inventory
  • Shift (hold) - Sprint

Ctrl - Toggle crouching

A game made by @voxel and @ratrogue for 7dfps 2021. Write your thoughts and wishes in the comments!

Hint: This is a WIP and has bugs and problems. It might be that the generated level is not solvable - sorry for that!
